query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_assessments,
  SUM(CASE WHEN uniformatId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as with_uniformat,
  SUM(CASE WHEN uniformatId IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as without_uniformat
FROM assessments
WHERE componentCode IS NOT NULL AND componentCode != '';

mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2g8chP3aro94bni.root --database XnmtZZwX6e46H8JVZbq4Ta --execute SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_assessments,
  SUM(CASE WHEN uniformatId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as with_uniformat,
  SUM(CASE WHEN uniformatId IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as without_uniformat
FROM assessments
WHERE componentCode IS NOT NULL AND componentCode != '';
